# EDA

```{r}
datos_falt %>% 
  group_by(month) %>% 
  summarise(mean = mean(temp_max))
```

De 1972 a 2015 (43)

```{r}
datos_falt %>% 
  group_by(month) %>% 
  summarise(mean = mean(temp_max)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = month, y = mean, label = round(mean, 1))) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:12) +
  geom_text(nudge_y = 1) +
  labs(x = "Meses", y = "Temp")
```
